name: corrosion

effect.sword-shield: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
effect.the-crown-tundra: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
effect.legends-arceus: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.

short_effect: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
